LanguageData.AEXP_EggCrocodileUnfertilized.label: crocodile egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.AEXP_EggCrocodileUnfertilized.descriptio: An unfertilized crocodile egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.
LanguageData.AEXP_EggCrocodileFertilized.label: crocodile egg (fert.)
LanguageData.AEXP_EggCrocodileFertilized.description: A fertilized crocodile egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a crocodile. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
